name: GeoDash
body:
## Introduction

GeoDash is a modern web framework and approach for quickly producing visualizations of geospatial data. The name comes from "geospatial dashboard". 

The framework is built to be extremely extensible.  You can use GeoDash server (an implementation), the front-end framework, backend code, or just the Gulp pipeline.  Have fun!

## Learn More

Check out the following Medium post to learn more.

[https://medium.com](https://medium)

# The Stack

- [Gulp](https://github.com/geodashio/geodash.js)
- [Less](http://lesscss.org/)
- [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org/)
- [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/)
- [Leaflet](http://leafletjs.com/)

## Contributing

We're happy to accept pull requests.  Please make pull requests against the relevant repo, as listed below.

## Repos

- [geodash.github.io](https://github.com/geodashio/geodash.github.io)
- [geodash-base](https://github.com/geodashio/geodash-base)
- [geodash-framework-django](https://github.com/geodashio/geodash-framework-django)
- [geodash-server](https://github.com/geodashio/geodash-server)
- [geodash-devops](https://github.com/geodashio/geodash-devops)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
